org.openmuc.jdlms.client.impl
Class LNConnection

java.lang.Object
  org.openmuc.jdlms.client.impl.Connection
      org.openmuc.jdlms.client.impl.LNConnection
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpperLayer, org.openmuc.jdlms.client.IClientConnection, IAssociation
public class LNConnection
extends Connection

Variant of the connection class using unencrypted messages with logical name referencing to communicate with the remote smart meter

hlsAuthentication

public byte[] hlsAuthentication(byte[] processedChallenge,
                                long timeout)
                         throws java.io.IOException
Description copied from interface: IAssociation
Process step 3 and 4 of HIGH level security authentication

Parameters:
processedChallenge - Challenge of the server, processed with the pre-shared secret
timeout - Amount of milliseconds waited before the request is aborted
Returns:
The computed challenge from the remote server. Null if authentication failed
Throws:
java.io.IOException
